channel.title: Help me pleaseeeeeeee!
channel.description: Hey guys, I have a huge problem. Ok, I downloaded a source so I can edit it and play around with it. However it WILL NOT RUN!! I try to run the 'run.bat', but it opens and closes literally within a millisecond, I don't know what the problem is. Also when I try and compile it says 'the system cannot find the path specified'. Someone please help me, Im desperate..

item.title: Help me pleaseeeeeeee!
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

That’s exactly what I said. Pause ends the code, therefore stopping it from closing out.

Read full topic

item.title: Help me pleaseeeeeeee!
item.dc:creator: @Cloud7Strife Cloud7Strife
item.description:
@Cloud7Strife wrote:

Dude “pause” stops it so it wont close out and if you read what I posted I told him to put pause

Read full topic

item.title: Help me pleaseeeeeeee!
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

Because he already has this. The reason why the “CMD” box was closing automatically was caused by the “pause” to end the code.

Read full topic

item.title: Help me pleaseeeeeeee!
item.dc:creator: @Cloud7Strife Cloud7Strife
item.description:
@Cloud7Strife wrote:

Lol what did he say different than me?

Read full topic

item.title: Help me pleaseeeeeeee!
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

Screech is precisely correct, the pause ends the code.

Read full topic

item.title: Help me pleaseeeeeeee!
item.dc:creator: @X_Screech_X X Screech X
item.description:
@X_Screech_X wrote:

Ok, I’ll try to help you the best I can here. But to start this out ,this is not a title. Please refer to the sticky topic to learn how to make a title.

If you right-click your Runserver file, you should see

@echo off title CheezScape Server java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

after that, put a Pause

Brandon.

Read full topic

item.title: Help me pleaseeeeeeee!
item.dc:creator: @Cloud7Strife Cloud7Strife
item.description:
@Cloud7Strife wrote:

Right click it and press edit and after all the stuff written in it put

pause at the end

If that doesnt work look up a tut on how to set enviroment variables

For you’re compile you need the latest jdk version wich would be 1.6_07 and right click it and press edit and set this as path once you got jdk

"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe"

If you still got problems after this then post you’re problem

Read full topic

item.title: Help me pleaseeeeeeee!
